name: Belo Sun Mining Corp.
longDescription: Belo Sun Mining Corp is a Canada-based gold exploration and development company. It operates in Canada where its head office is located and in Brazil where its exploration and development properties are located. The company owns and operates the Volta Grande Gold project.
fulldescription: Belo Sun Mining Corp is a Canada-based gold exploration and development company. It operates in Canada where its head office is located and in Brazil where its exploration and development properties are located. The company owns and operates the Volta Grande Gold project.
fullAddress: 65 Queen Street West,Suite 900, 8th Floor, Toronto, ON, CA
